abstract: The federal government is proposing a one-page form to help students compare financial aid offers.
snippet: The federal government is proposing a one-page form to help students compare financial aid offers.
lead_paragraph: In its latest effort to simplify consumer finance, the new federal Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has teamed up with the Department of Education to create a one-page financial aid "shopping sheet."

headline.main: A One-Page Form to Compare College Aid Offers
